definitions.definition: The act of making an activity or substance no longer criminalized (no longer a crime , subject to criminal penalties, to perform or possess). ( Compare legalization , which often implies regulation . )
examples: the decriminalization of all plant-based psychedelics

definitions.definition: The act of ceasing to treat a person as a criminal , by making their activities legal or no longer subjecting them to the criminal justice system (but instead possibly the mental healthcare system, etc).

main_definition: The act of making an activity or substance no longer criminalized (no longer a crime , subject to criminal penalties, to perform or possess). ( Compare legalization , which often implies regulation . )
secondary_definitions: The act of ceasing to treat a person as a criminal , by making their activities legal or no longer subjecting them to the criminal justice system (but instead possibly the mental healthcare system, etc).
